thread.title: ‘This is About C*ck!’: Maher Slams Trump On His Obsession With Crowd Size
thread.title_full: ‘This is About C*ck!’: Maher Slams Trump On His Obsession With Crowd Size

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘This is About C*ck!’: Maher Slams Trump On His Obsession With Crowd Size
text:
‘This is About C*ck!’: Maher Slams Trump On His Obsession With Crowd Size by Justin Baragona | 10:39   Video 
During tonight’s Real Time with Bill Maher monologue, host Bill Maher took aim at President Donald Trump and his insistence that he drew the largest audience to ever see an inauguration. “He can’t stand it that when it comes to size of the crowd, Obama’s was bigger,” Maher said. “This is about c*ck, right? This is about d*ck! This is about a guy who never brought a woman to orgasm!” 
After remarking that Trump probably doesn’t think that exists for a woman, he brought up that this was also the week that gave us “alternative facts.” 
The comedian also knocked Trump on claiming 3 to 5 million illegal aliens voted in the election for Hillary Clinton, highlighting the whole story surrounding Bernhard Langer. 
Watch the monologue above, via HBO. 
[image via screengrab]
